name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A full-bodied red wine with strong tannins and notes of dark fruit, perfect for rich, fatty meats.

name: Chardonnay
description: A popular white wine known for its buttery texture and citrus notes, pairing well with rich seafood and poultry.

name: Pinot Noir
description: A light-bodied red wine with red fruit flavors and earthy undertones, versatile enough for fish and game.

name: Sauvignon Blanc
description: A high-acid white wine with herbaceous and citrus profiles, excellent with tangy foods and vegetables.

name: Steak
description: Red meat pairs best with bold red wines that can stand up to the fat and protein structure.

name: Spicy Thai Curry
description: Spicy dishes need wines with sweetness and low alcohol to balance the heat.

name: Blue Cheese
description: Pungent cheeses pair beautifully with sweet dessert wines for a salty-sweet contrast.

name: Dark Chocolate
description: Bitter dark chocolate needs a wine with some sweetness or intense fruit to avoid clashing.
